column1: WEATHER FORECAST FOR SEA AREAS AROUND THE ISLAND DURING NEXT 24 HOURS
Mainly fair weather will prevail sea areas around the island.
Winds will be easterly or north-easterly in the sea areas off the coast extending from Mannar to Matara
via Kankasanthurai, Trincomalee, Pottuvil and Hambantota, and winds will be variable in direction in
the other sea areas around the island. wind speed will be (15-30) kmph.
The sea areas around the island will be slight to moderate.
